thread.title: Matt Damon thrilled for pregnant Amal and George Clooney | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Matt Damon thrilled for pregnant Amal and George Clooney | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Matt Damon thrilled for pregnant Amal and George Clooney | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 109 shares Matt continued: 'I'm thrilled for him. She's amazing. He hit the jackpot. Just on every level. She is a remarkable woman. They're gonna be great. They're gonna be awesome parents. Those kids are lucky.' George and Matt have been longtime friends who appeared in the Ocean's Trilogy of films together. Expecting twins: Amal, shown last month at Los Angeles International Airport, is expecting twins with husband George The Syriana star told Parade magazine in September 2011 how his pals including Matt loved playing pranks on him. 'There’s good fun in watching those play out. And, hey, my friends are rough on me too. Brad Pitt‘s brutal, and Matt Damon. My friends used to change my outgoing phone message all the time,' George told the magazine. George also enlisted Matt and several other friends at a reduced rate for his 2014 World War II movie Monuments Men. Confirmed! George Clooney and wife Amal are expecting twins in June. The couple are pictured on January 9 in London Good friends: Matt and George are shown in 2007 at a screening of Ocean's Thirteen in Las Vegas Matt and his wife Luciana Barroso met up for a couples' dinner in London in October 2015 along with Amal, George and his pal Rande Gerber and wife Cindy Crawford. The Talk's Julie Chen announced the couple's double joy on Thursday's show after confirming the news with the actor. 'Beyoncé is not the only superstar expecting twins,' Chen, 47, said on the CBS show. 'Congratulations are in order for George and Amal Clooney!' The talk show host added: 'What we did find out is that the twins are due this June.' Exclusive: The Talk's Julie Chen announced the news on Thursday after confirming it with the 55-year-old actor On the move: The couple were last seen at Barcelona airport last week with the barrister looking glowing and happy in a sweater dress, tights and boots The human rights lawyer has been showing off a baby bump in recent weeks and appeared to be glowing and in good spirits when she was spotted at Barcelona airport last week with the Ocean's Eleven star. Amal kept comfy in a sweater dress that skimmed her stomach as well as opaque black tights and boots. The notoriously private couple kept tight-lipped about pregnancy rumors when they first arose last month. A source told InTouch in January that Amal, who is of Lebanese-British descent, 'is pregnant with twins: a boy and a girl.' The couple 'feel like they've hit the family jackpot' in light of the big news, the source told the magazine. Excited: Matt Damon has revealed his is 'thrilled' his pal George Clooney is expecting twins with wife Amal. 'They're gonna be awesome parents. Those kids are lucky,' he says 'When George and Amal found out it was twins they were surprised,' the source said, 'but also a little scared because they both had said that one was enough. 'But the news that it was a boy and a girl made them both really happy ... they can't believe in just a few months, they're going to have two babies.' In addition to InTouch, Amal's pregnancy with twins was reported by The Lebanon Daily Star earlier this year. Amal joins another high-profile star who's expecting twins this year. Glowing: The Lebanese-British lawyer showed off her baby bump in casual outfit Last week singer Beyonce confirmed she is preparing to welcome twins with husband Jay Z. George and Amal met through mutual friends at a charity fundraising event in September 2013. When their romance went public a source said: 'Clooney asked her out for dinner and she put him off twice, saying she was too busy, before accepting the third time. She was operating on the lines of 'treat 'em mean, keep 'em keen'.' The couple got engaged less than a year later in April 2014 and married on September 27, 2014 at Ca'Farsetti Palace - located in Venice, Italy in front of 100 guests. A notorious Hollywood bachelor, George once vowed he would never get married again and never have children. Rumors: A source told InTouch last month that Amal, 39, who is of Lebanese-British descent, 'is pregnant with twins: a boy and a girl.' In 2006 he told People magazine, 'Marriage? Who knows? I've been married. It's not something I'm looking out for' The star was previously married to actress Talia Balsam from 1989 to 1993 before having a string of high-profile romances. He dated British model Lisa Snowdon on and off between 2000 and 2005 and briefly dated actress Renée Zellweger in 2001. The Descendants star also dated actress Krista Allen, model Sarah Larson and Italian actress Elisabetta Canalis. Before meeting Amal George also romanced WWE star Stacy Keibler from 2011 to 2013. Starting a family: The couple got engaged in April 2014 before tying the knot in Venice, Italy on September 27 of that year. They are pictured in May 2016
